mapper.select: select * from kmasters.GoodsView where ctCode = ${ctCode}
select * from kmasters.GoodsView where ctCode = '${ctCode}' and ${eqCaCode} = '${eqCaName}'
select cacode as eqCaCode , caname as eqCaName from kmasters.ca where cacode like 'E_'
select sfcode as sfCode , sfname as sfName from kmasters.sf where sfctcode = '${ctCode}'
select stcode as stCode , stname as stName from kmasters.st where stcode like 'E_'
mapper.update: update kmasters.eq set eqcacode = '${eqCaCode}' , eqname = '${eqName}' where eqctcode = '${ctCode}' and eqcode = '${eqCode}'
update kmasters.eg set egsfcode = '${sfCode}' , egstcode = '${stCode}', egdate = '${egDate}' where egeqctcode = '${ctCode}' and egeqcode = '${eqCode}'
mapper.select: select Max(eqcode)+1 as eqCode from kmasters.eq where eqcode like '1%' and eqctcode = ${ctCode}
select Max(eqcode)+1 as eqCode from kmasters.eq where eqcode like '2%' and eqctcode = ${ctCode}
select Max(eqcode)+1 as eqCode from kmasters.eq where eqcode like '3%' and eqctcode = ${ctCode}
select ctCode, caCode, lpQty, meName, paDate, paTotal from kmasters.PayView where ctCode='${ctCode}' and substr(paDate,0,6) = '${paDate}'

select nvl(sum(to_number(patotal,'999999999')),0)/10000 as paTotal, substr(paDate,0,6) as paDate from kmasters.payView where (substr(paDate,0,6)= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or substr(paDate,0,6)= to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm') or substr(paDate,0,6)= to_char(add_months(sysdate,-2),'yyyymm'))
and ctcode =${ctCode} group by substr(paDate,0,6) order by substr(paDate,0,6)
select meEmail, meNumber from kmasters.me
select max(mecode)+1 as meCode from kmasters.me
select ctCode from kmasters.ct
mapper.insert: insert into kmasters.ct(ctcode, ctname, ctaddress, ctceo, ctnumber) values('${ctCode}','${ctName}','${ctAddress}','${sfName}','${sfNumber}')
mapper.select: select ctCode, meName,meGender,meBirth,meNumber,caName,mgstcode as stCode,lpQty,caCode, meCode from kmasters.MeMgView where ctcode = ${ctCode}

select nvl(lpStocks,0) as lpStocks from( select clv.ctcode as ctCode, clv.caname as caName, count(rl.mecode) as lpStocks, rl.stCode from kmasters.calpview clv left outer join kmasters.relsview rl on clv.ctcode = rl.ctcode and clv.cacode = rl.cacode where clv.ctCode = '${ctCode}' and rl.meCode = '${meCode}' and clv.caName = '${caName}' group by clv.ctcode, clv.caname, rl.stCode)clv right outer join dual on clv.stCode = 'R2'
select meCode, caCode, sfCode from kmasters.relsview
mapper.update: update kmasters.mg set mgstcode='M2' where mgctcode='${ctCode}' and mgmecode='${meCode}'
mapper.select: select ctCode, meName,meGender,meBirth,meNumber,caName,mgstcode as stCode,lpQty,caCode, meCode from kmasters.MeMgView where ctcode = '${ctCode}' and mgstcode = '${stCode}'
select ctCode, meName,meGender,meBirth,meNumber,caName,mgstcode as stCode,lpQty,caCode, meCode from kmasters.MeMgView where ctcode = '${ctCode}' and cacode = '${caCode}'
select ctCode, meName,meGender,meBirth,meNumber,caName,mgstcode as stCode,lpQty,caCode, meCode from kmasters.MeMgView where ctcode = '${ctCode}' and ${meCode} = '${meName}'

select lp.lpctcode as ctCode, lp.lpcacode as caCode, lp.lpQty, lp.lpPrice ,ca.caName from kmasters.lp inner join kmasters.ca on lp.lpcacode = ca.cacode where lp.lpctcode = ${ctCode} order by cacode,lpqty
mapper.insert: insert into kmasters.mg(mgmecode, mgctcode) values((select mecode from kmasters.me where mename = '${meName}' and meemail = '${meEmail}'),'${ctCode}')
insert into kmasters.mg(mgmecode, mgctcode) values((select mecode from kmasters.me where mename = '${meName}' and meemail = '${meEmail}'),'${ctCode}',add_months(SYSDATE,${lpQty})-SYSDATE)

insert into kmasters.pa(palpctcode, palpcacode, palpqty, pamecode, patotal) values('${ctCode}','${caCode}','${lpQty}',(select mecode from kmasters.me where mename = '${meName}' and meemail = '${meEmail}'), (select lpprice from kmasters.lp where lpctcode = '${ctCode}' and lpcacode = '${caCode}' and lpqty = '${lpQty}'))
mapper.update: update kmasters.mg set mgremaining = case when mgremaining>0 then mgremaining -1 else 0 end
update kmasters.sf set sfname = '${sfName}', sfemail = '${sfEmail}', sfnumber = '${sfNumber}', sfrank = '${sfRank}', sfpassword = '${sfPw}' where sfctcode = '${ctCode}' and sfcode = '${sfId}'
update kmasters.sf set sfname = '${sfName}', sfemail = '${sfEmail}', sfnumber = '${sfNumber}', sfrank = '${sfRank}' where sfctcode = '${ctCode}' and sfcode = '${sfId}'
mapper.select: select mmv.mename, mmv.mecode, (select caName from kmasters.ca where ca.cacode = mmv.megender) as meGender, mmv.mebirth, nvl((select sf.sfname from kmasters.sf where sf.sfcode = mgv.sfcode and sf.sfctcode = mgv.ctcode),'미할당') as sfName, mmv.menumber, (select me.meemail from kmasters.me where me.mecode = mmv.mecode) as meEmail, nvl(mmv.caname,'미할당') as caName, nvl(mmv.patotal,0) as paTotal, nvl(eq.eqname,'미할당') as locker from kmasters.memgview2 mmv full outer join kmasters.mglssfVIEW2 mgv on mmv.ctcode = mgv.ctcode and mmv.mecode = mgv.mecode left outer join kmasters.lg on mmv.mecode = lg.lgmecode and mmv.ctcode = lg.lgeqctcode left outer join kmasters.eq on eq.eqctcode = lg.lgeqctcode and eq.eqcode = lg.lgeqcode where mmv.ctcode = '${ctCode}' and mmv.mecode = '${meCode}'

SELECT DISTINCT IDCOUNT AS idCount, DAUNIT AS daUnit, DANAME AS daName, SUBSTR(IDIBCODE,6,14) AS ibDate, (SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG(CAST(EX.EXUNIT AS VARCHAR(50)),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EX.EXUNIT),'([^,]+)(,\1)+', '\1' ) FROM KMASTERS.EX WHERE EXCODE = TAEXCODE) AS exUnit, (SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE (LISTAGG(CAST(TA.TAMOTION AS VARCHAR(50)),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY TA.TAMOTION),'([^,]+)(,\1)+', '\1' ) FROM KMASTERS.TA WHERE SUBSTR(TAIDIBCODE,6,14) =(SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(TAIDIBCODE),6,14) FROM KMASTERS.TA WHERE SUBSTR(TAIDIBCODE,1,5)='${meCode}') AND SUBSTR(TAIDIBCODE,1,5)='${meCode}') AS taMotion,
(SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG(CAST(EX.EXNAME AS VARCHAR(50)),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EX.EXNAME),'([^,]+)(,\1)+', '\1' ) FROM KMASTERS.EX INNER JOIN KMASTERS.TA ON EX.EXCODE = TA.TAEXCODE WHERE SUBSTR(TAIDIBCODE,6,14) =(SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(TAIDIBCODE),6,14) FROM KMASTERS.TA WHERE SUBSTR(TAIDIBCODE,1,5)='${meCode}') AND SUBSTR(TAIDIBCODE,1,5)='${meCode}' ) AS exName, (SELECT STNAME FROM KMASTERS.ST WHERE ST.STCODE = PE.PESTCODE ) AS stCode
FROM KMASTERS.ID INNER JOIN KMASTERS.DA ON ID.IDDACODE = DA.DACODE INNER JOIN KMASTERS.TA ON ID.IDIBCODE = TA.TAIDIBCODE INNER JOIN KMASTERS.EX ON TA.TAEXCODE = EX.EXCODE INNER JOIN KMASTERS.PE ON EX.EXCODE = PE.PETAEXCODE INNER JOIN KMASTERS.ST ON PE.PESTCODE = ST.STCODE WHERE SUBSTR(IDIBCODE,6,8) =(SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(TAIDIBCODE),6,8) FROM KMASTERS.TA WHERE SUBSTR(TAIDIBCODE,1,5) = '${meCode}') AND SUBSTR(IDIBCODE,1,5) = ${meCode} ORDER BY DANAME
mapper.update: update kmasters.me set meName = '${meName}' , meNumber = '${meNumber}', meEmail = '${meEmail}' where meCode = '${meCode}'
mapper.select: select max(sfcode) +1 as sfId from kmasters.sf where sfctcode = '${ctCode}'
mapper.update: update kmasters.ls set lsopen = to_date(#{lsOpen},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), lsprogress= #{lsProgress}, lsMeCount = #{lsMeCount} where lssfctcode = #{ctCode} and lsName = #{lsName}
update kmasters.ls set lsstcode='D2' where lssfctcode = '${ctCode}' and lsCode = '${lsCode}'
mapper.select: SELECT rere.meName, rere.meCode, rere.meGender, rere.meBirth, rere.meNumber, rere.ctCode, rere.relscode as lsCode, rere.reDate, re.restCode as stCode FROM (select mv.mename as meName, mv.mecode, (select ca.caname from kmasters.ca where ca.cacode = mv.megender) as meGender, mv.meBirth, mv.meNumber, re.relsctcode as ctCode, re.relscode, MAX(re.redate) as reDate from kmasters.re inner join kmasters.memgview mv on re.relsctcode = mv.ctcode and re.remecode = mv.mecode group by mv.mename, mv.meBirth, mv.meNumber, re.relsctcode, re.relscode, meGender, re.relsctcode, mv.mecode) rere inner join kmasters.re on re.relsctcode = rere.ctcode and re.relscode = rere.relscode and re.remecode = rere.mecode and re.reDate = rere.reDate where rere.ctCode='${ctCode}' and rere.relscode = '${lsCode}'
mapper.update: update kmasters.re set restcode = '${stCode}' where relsctcode = '${ctCode}' and relscode = '${lsCode}' and remecode = '${meCode}'
